text: Rob Shick (born 4 December 1957 in Port Alberni, British Columbia) is a retired National Hockey League referee. He began his career with the 1985â€“86 NHL season. He retired in March 2009. http://www.nhlofficials.com/member_listing.asp?member_id=2075 Rob Shick's profile at NHLOfficials.com ==Career== Shick refereed over 1,321 NHL regular season games, 130 playoff games, and two All-Star Games during his career. His final game was on March 7, 2009 at Ronald B. Stafford Arena where the Plattsburgh State Cardinals faced the Norwich Cadets. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey people from British Columbia Category:National Hockey League Category:Ice hockey officials
title: Rob Shick
